c74object.name: vsqrt~
c74object.description:
vsqrt~ provides a CPU efficient version of sqrt~ using SIMD operations.
vsqrt~ will output a signal which is the square-root function of the input signal.

method.name: signal
method.digest: Output a signal that is the square root of the input signal
method.description: The object outputs a signal that is the square root of the input signal. A negative input has no real solution, so it causes an output of 0.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The square root of the input signal.
